library(flipbookr)
library(tidyverse)

update_header <- function(header = NULL){
	txt <- paste(c('layout: true', '', '<div class="my-header">', '<span>BIOF 339: Practical R</span>', '</div>'),
				 collapse = '\n')
	if(!is.null(header)){
		txt <- paste(c(txt, header), collapse = '\n\n')
	}
	return(cat(txt))
}
